4.1.6 Rūpasaññāsutta
Okkantasaṃyutta
Cakkhuvagga
Rūpasaññāsutta
307.
1053Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Rūpasaññā, bhikkhave, aniccā vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī; saddasaññā…  gandhasaññā…  rasasaññā…  phoṭṭhabbasaññā…  dhammasaññā aniccā vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī. Yo, bhikkhave, ime dhamme evaṃ saddahati adhimuccati, ayaṃ vuccati ‘saddhānusārī…pe…  sambodhiparāyano’”ti.
1054Chaṭṭhaṃ.
